page.title: 06Twyford Farm Shop.(1)
page.content: Twyford Farm Shop is in Norton on the A435 road to Evesham.It was originally just a fruit farm but now it is much more.It now has an adventure playground,walks,fishing,look out tower and a reservoir with ducks on it.There is also a conservation area near the river where the reed warbler is nesting.There is also free parking. There are many water and garden plants in the garden centre and the cafe sells delicious cakes. We tasted one on our visit.There are lots of toys on the adventure playground and a picnic area. There are four different walks red,blue,white and yellow.Each walk is a different length.My favourite is the blue one which goes down to the river and back.The yellow walk leads to the fishing area. Mr Fisher grows different varieties of .
